column4: No recompiling the kernel then... In that case I need to set my CC environment variable pointing at gcc version 3.4.5. However, I can only find gcc v. 3.4.4 in the SPM... Ideas?
what are you trying to do?
it's the "Does not break upgrades of X"-way
I' trying to install vmWare, but got stuck when it wanted to compile some kernel modules which I didn't have natively.
